smg.text: Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Light rain at first. Force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 5 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. A few light rain patches. Force 2 to 4 east to northeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
